snippet: Two Democratic senators accused the Obama administration of seeking to “ignore or justify” statements it made to the Supreme Court about warrantless surveillance by the National Security Agency.
abstract: Democratic Sens Mark Udall and Ron Wyden accuse the Obama administration of seeking to 'ignore or justify' statements it made to the Supreme Court about warrantless surveillance by the National Security Agency.
lead_paragraph: Two Democratic senators accused the Obama administration of seeking to “ignore or justify” statements it made to the Supreme Court about warrantless surveillance by the National Security Agency.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Criticized on Spying Statements
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Criticized on Spying Statements
